accessToken.description: Meta access token for Conversions API authentication (like your_access_token)

pixelId.description: Meta Pixel ID from your Facebook Business account (like 1234567890)

action_source.description: Source of the event (website, app, phone_call, etc.) (like website)

doNotHash.description: Array of user_data fields that should not be hashed (like ['client_ip_address', 'client_user_agent'])

test_event_code.description: Test event code for debugging Meta Conversions API events (like TEST12345)

url.description: Custom URL for Meta Conversions API endpoint (like https://graph.facebook.com/v17.0)

user_data.description: Mapping configuration for user data fields (like { email: 'user.email', phone: 'user.phone' })
